titleStmt.title: Believers priviledges and duties and the exercise of communicants; holden forth in severall sermons: preached on diverse texts and at severall occasions. By the learned, pious and laborious servant of Jesus Christ, Mr Alexander Wedderburne first minister of the gospell at Forgan in Fife; and thereafter at Kilmarnock in the West. Part first.
titleStmt.author: Wedderburn, Alexander, d. 1678.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
